00044 #define TRUE  1
00045 #define FALSE 0
00046 
00047 #include <avr/io.h>
00048 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00049 #include "timer.h"
00050 
00051 /****************************************************************************/
00080 void timer0Init(uint8_t mode,uint16_t timerClock)
00081 {
00082   if (timerClock > 5) timerClock = 5;
00083 #if defined(__AVR_ATMega64__) || \
00084     defined(__AVR_ATMega128__) || \
00085     defined(__AVR_ATMega103)
00086 /* Rescale clock values to match those of the above MCUs */
00087   if (timerClock > 2) ++timerClock;
00088   if (timerClock > 4) ++timerClock;
00089 #endif
00090   outb(TIMER_CONT_REG0,((inb(TIMER_CONT_REG0) & 0xF8)|(timerClock & 0x07)));
00091 #if defined (TCNT0L)
00092   outw(TCNT0,0);                    /* 16 bit - clear both registers */
00093 #else
00094   outb(TCNT0,0);                    /* Clear the register */
00095 #endif
00096 #if (TIMER_INTERRUPT_MODE == 1)
00097   sbi(TIMER_FLAG_REG0, TOV0);       /* Force clear the interrupt flag */
00098   sbi(TIMER_MASK_REG0, TOIE0);      /* Enable the overflow interrupt */
00099   sei();
00100 #endif
00101 }
00102 
00103 /****************************************************************************/
00117 uint16_t timer0Read()
00118 {
00119 #if defined (TCNT0L)
00120   return inw(TCNT0);
00121 #else
00122   return (int16_t) inb(TCNT0);
00123 #endif
00124 }
